Html:
Hello,

are there plans to implement "save / load" of rules and "export / import" of updates?

These features would be very helpful.

Kind regards
Michael

Hello SGK1,

"Save/Load" set of rules will be in the next release. I'm testing it for now.
Can you tell me more on "Export/Import" of updates ?

Thanks.

Thank you!

DCourtel wrote:
Can you tell me more on "Export/Import" of updates ?

Thanks.
I found this useful feature in LUP - so it will be possible to transfer a complete (all files, all rules) an tested update in *.cab-format (contains the update in cab- and the other informations in xml-format) from one WSUS to an other (... with the same certificate).
Hi SGK1, I have found the time to add this feature : Import/Export Updates. It will be in the next release.
